abstract: Prosecutors are moving to dismiss domestic abuse charge against Colorado Rockies shortstop Jose Reyes after his wife Katherine Ramirez refuses to cooperate with investigation.
lead_paragraph: The prosecuting attorney said Jose Reyes’s wife had not cooperated with investigators following the Rockies shortstop’s arrest in Hawaii in October.

headline.main: Charge Set to Be Dropped in Jose Reyes Case
headline.print_headline: Charge Set to Be Dropped in Reyes Case

snippet: The prosecuting attorney said Jose Reyes’s wife had not cooperated with investigators following the Rockies shortstop’s arrest in Hawaii in October.
